Name: Phosphoribosyl pyrophosphate synthetase
Function: Involved in purine and pyrimidine biosynthesis; catalyzes PRPP formation, a key step in nucleotide metabolism

Name: Methionyl-tRNA synthetase
Function: Essential for protein synthesis; charges tRNA with methionine

Name: Aerobic respiration control sensor kinase
Function: Part of the ArcA/ArcB two-component system regulating respiratory gene expression under anaerobic conditions

Name: Phenylalanyl-tRNA synthetase beta chain
Function: Charges tRNA with phenylalanine; essential in translation

Name: Aspartyl-tRNA synthetase
Function: Plays a role in translation by attaching aspartate to its corresponding tRNA

Name: Heat shock protein HflC/HflK family
Function: Regulates proteolysis and stabilizes membrane proteins under stress conditions

Name: Small protein B
Function: Essential for tmRNA function in trans-translation during ribosome stalling

Name: Translation inhibition factor
Function: Protects ribosomes during stress by binding to 70S ribosomes and halting translation

Name: GMP synthase
Function: Involved in purine nucleotide biosynthesis, catalyzing GMP formation

Name: Hypothetical protein YihL
Function: Putative uncharacterized protein; possible role in stress or transport (functional characterization pending)

Name: Uncharacterized conserved protein
Function: Predicted involvement in biofilm or fimbriae regulation; limited functional annotation
